description: Polymer behavior definition for iron-selector's selectable items, including properties, event handling, and selection logic.

methods.name: indexOf
methods.description: Returns the index of the given item within the items array.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Sets the selected value.

methods.name: selectPrevious
methods.description: Selects the previous item in the list.

methods.name: selectNext
methods.description: Selects the next item in the list.

methods.name: _addListener
methods.description: Adds an event listener for the specified event.

methods.name: _removeListener
methods.description: Removes an event listener for the specified event.

methods.name: _activateEventChanged
methods.description: Handles changes to the activateEvent property, updating event listeners accordingly.

methods.name: _updateItems
methods.description: Updates the list of item nodes based on the current DOM and selection criteria.

methods.name: _updateSelected
methods.description: Updates the selected item based on the current selected value.

methods.name: _selectSelected
methods.description: Selects the item corresponding to the current selected value.

methods.name: _filterItem
methods.description: Filters out excluded local names from the list of items.

methods.name: _valueToItem
methods.description: Converts a value to its corresponding item object.

methods.name: _valueToIndex
methods.description: Converts a value to its index in the items array.

methods.name: _indexToValue
methods.description: Converts an index to its corresponding value.

methods.name: _valueForItem
methods.description: Retrieves the value for an item based on attrForSelected.

methods.name: _applySelection
methods.description: Applies visual and attribute changes to an item based on its selection state.

methods.name: _selectionChange
methods.description: Updates the selectedItem property based on current selection.

methods.name: _observeItems
methods.description: Sets up a mutation observer to watch for changes in the item list.

methods.name: _activateHandler
methods.description: Handles activation events from items, updating selection accordingly.

methods.name: _itemActivate
methods.description: Activates an item programmatically, firing the iron-activate event.
